trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Honolulu
There were no other sightings in Honolulu on or around December 28th 2012
Summary: bright pulsating red object that dissipated followed by a subtle white flash
divs: Sighting Detailsmakiki, oahu, hawaii. dec.28, 2012. 11:30pm (hst) i was walking home from safeway on pi'ikoi and kinau st. and something caught in my peripheral vision. my girlfriend and i saw a bright red orb hovering well over the normal airplane lines. we watched in awe for about 30sec then it dissipated. we felt something was still there so we watched for another 5-10 sec and saw a subtle white flash of light. it was a crystal clear nite, not one cloud in the sky. we thought, hmm, a flare, based off the altitude, this object would be over the pacific ocean. but no way we'd see a flare that high and bright in the sky over 2 miles inland very high over buildings. so, maybe, we were lucky enough to see, what to us, was a ufo.
